description:
Wi-Fi connection required. Please watch the 3rd party review of Video Flood HD from REV TV linked to above. Don’t like scouring the web for video content? Enjoy just sitting back and watching videos? Whether you are looking for video podcasts, TV shows, movies or YouTube videos, Video Flood HD has you covered. Quickly enjoy full episodes of your favorite TV shows such as Pawn Stars, full movies such as Groundhog Day, or video podcasts such as The Engadget Show.  

v3.3.9 Updates: 1. Updated the ABC, NBC, and CBS links

Video Flood HD enables you to quickly and easily view a large number of TV shows and movies. Have compiled websites from ABC, NBC, CBS, FX, etc that offer full episodes of their shows online and made them available in one simple to use interface. Also there are over 300 full movies linked to. These websites are effortlessly accessed and navigated so you can start watching full TV episodes and movies as quickly as possible. Websites are tested to ensure they perform optimally on the Touchpad. 

Video Flood HD also enables you to view and download almost 200 video podcasts containing thousands of videos. Users can also add additional video podcast subscriptions and add videos to a favorites list. The videos can be streamed directly to the Touchpad’s video player and downloaded. Can IM, Facebook & Email the video URL/Link. Podcasts have been tested, to insure proper functionality. 

Furthermore Video Flood HD allows you to browse YouTube videos in a clean simple to use interface. Browse videos by category such as by most popular and most viewed. Can also perform your own custom searches of videos. The videos can be viewed within the App through the YouTube website or a full screen video player. Also add videos to a favorites list or IM, Facebook & Email the video URL/Link.
versionNote: Updated the ABC, NBC, and CBS links
